thread.section_title: Statistics Canada, The Daily: Information and communications technology
thread.title: Commercial Software Price Index, August 2015

title: Commercial Software Price Index, August 2015
text:
The Commercial Software Price Index ( CSPI ) increased 2.3% in August compared with the previous month. 
Year over year, the CSPI was up 12.1%. Note to readers The Commercial Software Price Index ( CSPI ) is a   the change in the purchase price of software typically bought by businesses and governments.   index is   
This index is   CSPI
